instruction: How does artificial intelligence impact our daily life?
output: Artificial intelligence has had a significant impact on our daily lives. AI-based technologies, such as voice assistants and facial recognition, allow us to complete tasks faster and more accurately. AI also helps us to make more informed decisions by providing real-time data and insights. Finally, AI is helping to power a new era of automation, where machines are taking on roles traditionally performed by humans, such as driving cars and performing medical diagnoses.
